section.title: NAME
section.p: hint - Set the maximum amount of records in result set.

section.title: DESCRIPTION
section.p: Set the maximum amount of records in result set.

plentry.pd:
The parameter "num" sets the maximum amount of records in result set.
Format The method "cousor.limit()" contains the parameter "num". It is in the type of "int". If the value of "num" is not specified, it will return all the records in the result set. If users need the first 5 records, the value of "num"should be set as 5.

section.title: Examples
section.p: Select records with the value of "age" greater than 10 in the collection "bar" and return the first 10 records.

note.p: If the amount of records in the result set is lesser than 10, it will return all the records. It it is greater than 10, it will return the first 10 records.
